query:
SELECT 
  a.id,
  a.smshubActivationId,
  a.phoneNumber,
  a.serviceId,
  s.name as serviceName,
  s.smshubCode,
  a.countryId,
  c.name as countryName,
  a.createdAt
FROM activations a
LEFT JOIN services s ON a.serviceId = s.id
LEFT JOIN countries c ON a.countryId = c.id
WHERE a.id = 18;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 35dchGD4KrPJFby.root --database 2KeMNLvGvAyUJv9AEWkrsw --execute

  a.phoneNumber,
  a.serviceId,
  s.name as serviceName,
  s.smshubCode,
  a.countryId,
  c.name as countryName,
  a.createdAt
FROM activations a
LEFT JOIN services s ON a.serviceId = s.id
LEFT JOIN countries c ON a.countryId = c.id
WHERE a.id = 18;
